channel.title: Minecraft from perspective
channel.description: I have been looking into minecraft and watching movie researching becasue i was bored okay so don't judge me! Anyways i realized that the programming i do was what made minecraft and notch started programming when he was my age too! I got so inspired by him and he said such wise things it taught me to push myself harder and work for my goals as a programmer! Am I the only human who did this? :D Reply down below what you think?

item.title: Minecraft from perspective
item.dc:creator: @Techkid Techkid
item.description:
@Techkid wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:7, topic:533119”][quote author=Techkid link=topic=651912.msg4391326#msg4391326 date=1387629976]

perspective*

Really? You had to waste about 5 seconds out of your life to correct me? Congratulations

And you had to waste fudge knows how long writing about how some Swedish dude who wrote a basic java game and built off it inspires you.

Seriously, Minecraft isn’t that advanced. I mean no disrespect, of course, just saying it’s not really an intuitive topic.

Sorry I just saying. In my opinion I think it’s pretty cool that this guy coded it himself for months.
[/quote]
So did almost every other startup out there.[/quote]
Very good point. I never thought about it that way.

Read full topic
